description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.FKHPrjT3yPLxyp9P]{Fortified Mind}

Your mind is a fortress. When others intrude, you can push them back with incredible force.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.d7o4eg6e0xgstNfQ]{Iron Will}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.C36IM0fwUJaJPTCm]{telepathy} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.QmSOsPFazgFH1kKu]{limited telepathy}

Benefit: When you succeed on a Will saving throw against a mind-affecting effect, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to mentally counter your foe’s attack. If you do, the source of the triggering Will save suffers a mental backlash, taking a –2 penalty to Will saves and reducing the DC of any of its spells or abilities that allow a Will save by 2 for 1 minute.

system.requirements: Iron Will, telepathy or limited telepathy
